overview: Department-store models Flo and Marian set their sights on wealthy young soft-drink magnate J. A. Smith. Through a misunderstanding, they pick on the wrong J. A. Smith, a fortune hunter himself who assumes that Marian is a wealthy widow. Meanwhile, Marian falls for the real Smith, never dreaming that he's the millionaire.
tagline: The Deluxe Adventures of a Pair of Husband-Hunting Gold Diggers- Smart, Brightly Sophisticated, Swift, Gay, Surprising!
title: Footloose Widows
